title: Google Stadia now has Click-to-Play trials and new development porting tools
content:
Google has been expanding its Stadia game streaming service recently, with support for more smart TVs and the slow-but-steady rollout of additional games. However, reports about Google’s attention shifting from a games service to a white-label streaming technology for other companies has put a damper on excitement around Stadia. Now there’s somegood news for both

The post Google Stadia now has Click-to-Play trials and new development porting tools appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google is rolling out two impropvemetns that might give Stadia a much-needed boost: Click-to-Play trials and a new suite of dev tools.
